<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_1837836_hr_cas_1_hr_case</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_1837836_hr_cas_1_hr_case">assignment_groupISEMPTY^category=others^EQ<item endquery="false" field="assignment_group" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item display_value="Others" endquery="false" field="category" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="others"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Record Producer = Others</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous) {

    switch (current.category.toString()) {

        case 'Others':
            current.assignment_group = '70c833614761b610d1321af2e16d4338';
            break;

        case 'Payroll':
            current.assignment_group = 'dda83f2547a1b610d1321af2e16d4381';
            break;

        case 'Leave':
            current.assignment_group = 'f0b8bf2547a1b610d1321af2e16d4376';
            break;

        case 'Onboarding':
            current.assignment_group = '5358f32547a1b610d1321af2e16d4397';
            break;

        case 'Travel':
            current.assignment_group = 'e6b8ff2547a1b610d1321af2e16d4353';
            break;

		case 'Offboarding':
            current.assignment_group = 'db98fb2547a1b610d1321af2e16d43a4';
            break;
    }

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2026-02-09 08:11:41</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>74d36ec4470ffed0d1321af2e16d43dc</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Record Producer = Others</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="HR Case Management" source="x_1837836_hr_cas_1">e4f06aa147e57610d1321af2e16d4311</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="HR Case Management">e4f06aa147e57610d1321af2e16d4311</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_74d36ec4470ffed0d1321af2e16d43dc</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2026-02-09 08:23:31</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=74d36ec4470ffed0d1321af2e16d43dc"/></record_update>
